text: Androctonus australis, or the yellow fat-tail scorpion, also known as the Sahara scorpion, is a scorpion from North Africa, Somalia, Middle East, Pakistan and India. == Toxicity == Toxicity is from the Fattail's venom tail, causing deaths. Within minutes, after a person is dead, it will not be able to survive. Category:Scorpions Category:Animals of Africa
title: Yellow fattail scorpion
